title: thebloodmaster
author: thebloodmaster
content: Hello are their any exchanges left  that still has instant sepa withdrawals? i know binance had it but no more sadly

comments.author: bitmover
comments.body: Quote from: thebloodmaster on September 20, 2022, 02:14:36 PMHello are their any exchanges left  that still has instant sepa withdrawals? i know binance had it but no more sadlyI made a sepa withdrawal today using bitstamp which took about 5 minutes. That actually saved me in a trip today when I was out of money. Just sold some btc and got money in a few minutes

comments.author: thebloodmaster
comments.body: Quote from: bitmover on September 20, 2022, 03:39:15 PMQuote from: thebloodmaster on September 20, 2022, 02:14:36 PMHello are their any exchanges left  that still has instant sepa withdrawals? i know binance had it but no more sadlyI made a sepa withdrawal today using bitstamp which took about 5 minutes. That actually saved me in a trip today when I was out of money. Just sold some btc and got money in a few minutes good to know thx

comments.author: LeGaulois
comments.body: Hi,Kraken has the option for instant SEPA for a long time, and maybe BitPanda.From my experience with instant SEPA, with some banks, it looks like it doesn't work when the sender is outside your country. No idea why.Several times I requested to be paid with an instant SEPA from guys in Germany and Italy and they weren't able to send it.I thought they were poor payers looking for an excuse. But in fact, it's the banks.

comments.author: thebloodmaster
comments.body: Quote from: LeGaulois on September 20, 2022, 07:37:21 PMHi,Kraken has the option for instant SEPA for a long time, and maybe BitPanda.From my experience with instant SEPA, with some banks, it looks like it doesn't work when the sender is outside your country. No idea why.Several times I requested to be paid with an instant SEPA from guys in Germany and Italy and they weren't able to send it.I thought they were poor payers looking for an excuse. But in fact, it's the banks. for me kraken has only instant sepa for deposits im from germany and kraken is never instant for me even tho they sent from fidor bank which is german they fast tho i still get it in the same day when i request at a good time binance had instant withdrawal even from lithuania so idk how this system works

comments.author: bullrun2024bro
comments.body: Quote from: thebloodmaster on September 20, 2022, 02:14:36 PMHello are their any exchanges left  that still has instant sepa withdrawals? i know binance had it but no more sadlyAbsolutely correct. The previous posters are on point.Kraken offers instant SEPA withdrawals in certain countries. Just check their TOS if its available at your place too. Or ask their support. I know that many users from the German forum section have already used their instant withdrawl service. It is slightly more expensive than a regular withdrawal, but the cost is only in the range of a few cents, if I remember correctly.Usually the funds are in your bank account within a few minutes. Pretty chill!

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Have you tried to use bestchange where you can filter exchanges that support sepa withdrawal?Look at this one https://www.bestchange.com/bitcoin-to-sepa.htmlMost of them are instant just make sure you check the exchange first if they have KYC verification. Bestchange filters them with an icon on the right side of the exchanges if it's manual, automatic, KYC verification, or if they are taking commission fee just hover the mouse to the right of the exchange name and also check the exchange after you access the site go to the bottom to read TOS/Privacy policy and AML/KYC POLICY to make sure you are using a non-KYC exchange.
